data.name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-15 S/MTD Set
data.detailed_description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.

Contains the following:
- Playable Aircraft: F-15 S/MTD
This new-and-improved experimental F-15 is equipped with 2D thrust vectoring nozzles and large canards for increased air combat maneuverability. This aircraft takes even greater command over the battlefield than its predecessor, overwhelming both air and ground targets with its sheer offensive power.
The S/MTD in its name stands for "Short Takeoff and Landing/Maneuver Technology Demonstrator".
- Also includes 7 skins, including the special "Sorcerer" skin.

This aircraft can equip the HPAA, FAEB, or HVAA as its special weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
